OrgName.entry: ACTION FOR CHILDREN - FOSTERING, YORKSHIRE AND THE HUMBER

AltName.entry: FOSTER CARE NCH - COMMUNITY PLACEMENT SHEFFIELD (FORMER NAME)

Desc.entry: A registered charity which works in partnership with local authorities in Yorkshire and surrounding areas to provide foster placements for young people. Aims to provide high quality foster placements for troubled children and teenagers aged 8-17 years, by careful matching, high levels of support and a generous fee for foster carers. Referral via local authority social workers, potential carers can self-refer.
